Activity: Log in to the EHR system and check for any updates or messages from colleagues.
Prepare the vaccination station with necessary supplies (vaccines, syringes, alcohol swabs, band-aids).
Administer influenza vaccinations to scheduled patients, ensuring proper documentation in the EHR.
Educate patients on influenza prevention and treatment, answering any questions they may have.
Continue administering vaccinations and documenting in the EHR.
Review and update any incomplete EHR entries from the morning session.
Email @mrs-1 and @mrs-2 to ensure all vaccination records are accurately filed in the system.
Organize and restock vaccination supplies for the next day.
Check out with the clinical lead (@clinlead-1) to report any issues or concerns.
